org.vast.data

Class DataBlockBoolean

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.vast.data.AbstractDataBlock
      • org.vast.data.DataBlockBoolean
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Cloneable, DataBlock

    public class DataBlockBoolean
extends AbstractDataBlock

    Carries an array of boolean primitives. All data is casted to other types when requested.

    Since:
    Nov 23, 2005
    Author:
    Alex Robin
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
